function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 transmission in workplace settings","Impact":"Potential outbreaks, increased infections, and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective IPC measures, strict adherence to guidelines, and rapid response to cases","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, real-time monitoring and contact tracing apps, and telemedicine for remote diagnosis","People":"Employees, visitors, and customers in workplace settings","Owner":"Employers and management"},{"Description":"Inadequate PPE usage and availability","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure and transmission among employees","Mitigation":"Enforcement of PPE protocols, regular supply and distribution of PPE, and proper training on PPE usage","Technologies":"PPE inventory management systems, automated PPE dispensers, and virtual reality training simulations","People":"Employees and frontline workers","Owner":"Workplace safety and health officers"},{"Description":"Lack of education and awareness on IPC measures","Impact":"Misunderstanding of guidelines, poor compliance, and increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Comprehensive training programs, regular communication and signage, and accessible educational resources","Technologies":"Online training platforms, interactive educational materials, and digital communication tools","People":"Employees and management","Owner":"Human resources and training departments"}]}
